name: Banished

files.humbleinstaller: N/A:Please select the Humble Bundle installer

content:
files:
- humbleinstaller: N/A:Please select the Humble Bundle installer
game:
  arch: win64
  exe: drive_c/Program Files/Shining Rock Software LLC/Banished/Application-x64.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win64
    description: Creating Wine prefix
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    executable: humbleinstaller
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
